Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: Draw a healthy-looking plant with visible leaves to indicate enough water and light is present.
Illustrate a wilted plant to show lack of water.
Draw a plant that appears not to be growing well and could show elements such as discolored leaves to indicate a lack of light.
Create a visual comparison where a plant with water and light looks better than one without.
CANNOT: Might struggle to clearly illustrate the concept of a plant dying solely from lack of light (could show both water and light as deficient without clear distinction).
May not consistently depict the absence of light as the sole cause of poor plant health (e.g., might show a plant with both brown and yellow leaves without clarifying the role of light).
